trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<chunkedCookieHandler>" name="<chunkedCookieHandler>" href=""></xref> configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref uid="langword_csharp_<chunkedCookieHandler>" name="<chunkedCookieHandler>" href=""></xref>組態項目。

trans-unit.source: This class configures the chunk size for a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler> object that is configured through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會設定區塊大小<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler>物件透過設定<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>屬性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandlerElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandlerElement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the chunk size for the handler.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定處理常式區塊大小。
區塊大小，以位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: Do not set a value below the minimum chunk size defined by <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.MinimumChunkSize"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 未設定低於最小的區塊大小所定義的值<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.MinimumChunkSize"> </xref>。
